Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_SOPHIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's that? Your store sales have surpassed ten
million G?!
<PAGE>
That's quite the feat! As an old lady, I'm glad to
know youngsters like you are working so hard.
Means I can retire with confidence!

<NAME_MOB_SOPHIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You have a talent for business, you know that?
Honestly, earning more than a million G in sales!
How wonderful...

<NAME_MOB_SOPHIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear you've earned over a hundred thousand G
in sales. A hundred thousand! That's quite the
milestone!

<NAME_MOB_SOPHIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm so happy right now. I managed to get my
hands on something absolutely lovely, you see!

<NAME_MOB_SOPHIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whenever I'm doubting whether or not to buy
something, I always just give in, because I know
I'll regret it if I don't.
<PAGE>
Once a deal's been passed over, you see, you
just never know if you'll ever come across the
likes of it again!

<NAME_MOB_SOPHIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The nice thing about having grandchildren is
being able to spoil them rotten! And I believe I've
found the perfect present for mine.

<NAME_MOB_SOPHIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmmm. I hate to leave empty-handed, but if
there's nothing worth buying, there's no sense
spending money, right?

<NAME_MOB_SOPHIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I do love to splurge and just buy for the sake of
buying...but every now and again, perhaps it
pays to be a little frugal.

<NAME_MOB_SOPHIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here's hoping I find the perfect purchase next
time around!

<NAME_MOB_SOPHIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? Did you need something? I'm on my way
to do a bit of shopping at the moment.

<NAME_MOB_SOPHIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I do so love flowers. I hope this town's unique
bouquet of offerings doesn't let me down!

<NAME_MOB_SOPHIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hee hee. Why is shopping so much fun?! I's
almost criminal how lovely it feels to spend my
money!
